text:
A, B, F, G and H

A  
Explain the necessity for acquiring good note taking and note making techniques.  

B  
List the methods of note taking & note making  
- Identify good reading habits  

C  
Explain the different method of reading  
- Use the different method of reading explained in G  

D  
Write an algorithm and draw the flowchart determining the all-sayage of 3 given numbers a, b, c.  

Step 1: Start  
↓  
2: Declare Variables a, b, c  
↓  
3: Three (a + b + c) / 3  
↓  
4: Three 10's play  
↓  
5: Stop
